verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Join all the glorious names, newline Of wisdom love and power; newline That ever mortals knew, newline That angels ever bore. newline All are too mean to speak His worth, newline Too mean to set my Savior forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Great prophet of my God, newline My tongue would bless Thy name; newline By Thee the joyful news, newline Of our salvation came; newline The joyful news of sins forgiven, newline Of hell subdued and peace with heaven.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus, my great High Priest, newline Offered His blood and died; newline My guilty conscience seeks newline No sacrifice beside; newline His powerful blood did once atone, newline And now it pleads before the throne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My Savior and my Lord, newline My Conqueror and my King; newline Thy scepter and Thy sword, newline Thy reigning grace I sing; newline Thine is the power behold I sit, newline In willing bonds beneath Thy feet.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Now let my soul arise newline And tread the tempter down; newline My Captain leads me forth, newline To conquest and a crown; newline A feeble saint shall win the day, newline Though death and hell obstruct the way.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Should all the hosts of death newline And powers of hell unknown newline Put their most dreadful forms newline Of rage and malice on, newline I shall be safe for Christ displays, newline Superior power and guardian grace.
